rules:
    servers-must-exist-oas3:
        description: OpenAPI servers must be present and non-empty array.
        severity: error
        formats:
            :
        given: $
        then:
            field: servers
            function: schema
            functionOptions:
                schema:
                    items:
                        type: object
                    minItems: 1
                    type: array
        x-tags:
            :
